```{r pancreas 32472717, include=FALSE}

PMID_32472717 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('32472717', database = 'PubMed')

citation_32472717 <- paste0(PMID_32472717$journal,' ', PMID_32472717$year, ' ', PMID_32472717$month,';', PMID_32472717$volume,'(', PMID_32472717$number,'):', PMID_32472717$pages)

PubMed_32472717 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_32472717$eprint)

doi_32472717 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_32472717$doi)

Sys.sleep(1)

```
